thread.title: LegalNature Launches Professional Version for Law Firms and Small Business
thread.title_full: LegalNature Launches Professional Version for Law Firms and Small Business

author: Cathy Kenton
title: LegalNature Launches Professional Version for Law Firms and Small Business
text:
LegalNature , LLC, a leading provider of online legal and business documents, today announced the launch of LegalNature Pro , its subscription service designed specifically to meet the needs of law firms and small to mid-sized businesses. LegalNature Pro is a monthly subscription product that is both cost effective and provides a level of customization required by professionals and businesses. The company also announced that it would be demonstrating LegalNature Pro at ClioCon beginning October 19-20, 2015 in Chicago, IL. With the new Professional version, subscribers will enter client information, assemble documents, and download forms as often as necessary for a single monthly, per user, subscription cost of $59. Professional subscribers also have additional customization capabilities that allow them to include additional content often required in professional documents.
“Since our inception, lawyers and business professionals have made up a large percentage of our customers. They tell us that they find our platform easy to use and our documents highly accurate,” said Corey Bray, founder and CEO of LegalNature. “Their requests for increased access and customization capabilities led us to develop LegalNature Pro.”
LegalNature documents focus on the needs of business professionals and include real estate, employment, wills and estates, family law, and general business documents and forms. The intuitive web-based interface makes data entry and document assembly efficient for small business owners and their lawyers. Since early 2014, LegalNature has served over 450,000 users. Legal and business document downloads in 2015 continue to increase significantly month-over-month, and have already exceeded 650,000 documents generated in the United States and the United Kingdom since the first of the year.
LegalNature Pro will be debuted at ClioCon, the widely attended conference for Clio practice management users, consultants, and legal technology luminaries. The conference offers hands-on training and focuses on running a successful law practice. LegalNature will have the opportunity to engage with attendees and demonstrate how LegalNature Pro will help automate their document intensive practices.
About LegalNature:
LegalNature helps business and individuals simplify their legal needs by offering legal documents that are effortless to create and manage. The sophisticated form building technology at the heart of LegalNature offers step-by-step guidance to help users create venue specific documents for its customers in the U.S. and U.K. For more information, visit LegalNature.com .
